scan_type.name: scan_type
scan_type.description: defines the scan type to which the data belongs

scan_id.name: scan_id
scan_id.description: defines the ID of the scan

azimuth_angle.name: azimuth_angle
azimuth_angle.description: azimuth angle of the lidar beam at the start of the measurement, clockwise from north

elevation_angle.name: elevation_angle
elevation_angle.description: elevation angle of the lidar beam from horizontal plane

yaw.name: yaw
yaw.description: yaw angle of the lidar device

roll.name: roll
roll.description: roll angle of the lidar device

pitch.name: pitch
pitch.description: pitch angle of the lidar device
